sense.def:
Kadar človek
controls a country or organization
, ima moč, da sprejema vse pomembne odločitve o vodenju neke države ali organizacije.

seg.quote: The family had a controlling interest in the firm.
The rebels took control of a television station.

sense.def:
To control a machine, process, or system
pomeni poskrbeti, da stroj, postopek ali sistem deluje ali poteka tako, kot mora.

seg.quote: Computer systems control the lighting and heating.

sense.def:
Control of a machine, process, or system
je skrb, da stroj, proces ali sistem deluje tako, kot mora.

seg.quote: You should have control of your vehicle at all times.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To control oneself or one's feelings
pomeni prisiliti se, da se vedemo mirno, kadar smo jezni, razburjeni ali zmedeni.

Control over oneself
je sposobnost, da se prisilimo k mirnemu vedenju.

seg.quote: He told himself that he mustn't lose control.

sense.def:
To control something dangerous
pomeni preprečiti, da bi se nekaj nevarnega poslabšalo ali razširilo.

A control
je naprava, s katero upravljamo stroj.

Controls
so metode, s katerimi vlada omejuje naraščanje, na primer cen ali plač.

To be in control of something that is happening
pomeni, da lahko odločamo, kako se nekaj razvija.

seg.quote: Those who begin the revolution rarely stay in control to complete the process.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
beyond one's control
ali
outside one's control
, nimamo moči, da bi na tisto vplivali ali tisto spremenili.

seg.quote: The service is being withdrawn for reasons outside anyone's control.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
out of control
, nad tistim nihče nima oblasti.

Če je nekaj škodljivega
under control
, tisto učinkovito krotimo in verjetno ne bo več povzročalo škode.

seg.quote: The fever was brought under control.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
under one's control
, ima določen človek pravico odločati, kaj se bo s tistim zgodilo.
